mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon_info (cpId, cpName, cpPrice, cpStDate, cpEndDate, minPrice, grList ) VALUES(#{ cpId }, #{ cpName }, #{ cpPrice }, now(), #{ cpEndDate }, #{ minPrice }, #{ chClientType });
INSERT INTO coupon_list (cpId, cId, cpStatus ) VALUES(#{ cpId }, #{ clientId }, "사용가능");
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.cpId, A.cpName, A.cpPrice, A.minPrice, A.cpStDate, A.cpEndDate, B.cpStatus FROM coupon_info A LEFT JOIN coupon_list B ON A.cpId = B.cpId;
SELECT * FROM client WHERE grId=#{ chClientType }
